QueryViewSpec.Name: ChildExtension SponsorshipOppotunity Extension Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to view ChildExtension SponsorshipOppotunity Extension Fields
QueryViewSpec.Author: memphis-PC\Administrator

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select USR_CHILDEXTENSION.ID, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SIBLINGSID], (select USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE where USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID]) as BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CURRENTPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ORIGINALPROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE], (select USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE where USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID]) as CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE where USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID]) as CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE where USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASCODEID]) as FATHERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE where USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASCODEID]) as MOTHERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE where USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID]) as CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE where USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID]) as CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE where USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERREASONCODEID]) as CAREGIVERREASONCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFSISTERS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFBROTHERS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLWOOD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLMUD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBAMBOO], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBLOCK], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTIN], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGGRASSLEAVES], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGWOOD], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTILE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEINDOOR], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCECOMMUNITYTAP], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEBOREHOLEWELL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCERIVER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEWOODFIRE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEELECTRICSTOVE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEGASSTOVE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEELECTRICITY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOILLAMP], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEGENERATOR], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCENONE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOTHER], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[AREADESCRIPTION], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[MYFAVORITETHINGTODO], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SOMEDAYI], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[TWOMOSTFAVORITETHINGS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[OTHERTHINGSTHECHILDENJOYS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPERSONALITY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDHEALTH], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[SPIRITUALDEVELOPMENT], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[REASONNOTATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CLASSLEVEL], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[FAVORITESUBJECT], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[VOCATIONALSKILLS], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CCHENTEREDBY], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CCHTEMPID], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CURRENTPHOTODATE], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[PHOTOSTORED], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CCHVALIDATED], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.REGISTRATIONDATE (select USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE where USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID]) as CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE where USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID]) as CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.[PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION], ADDEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [ADDEDBY_APPLICATION], ADDEDBY.USERNAME as [ADDEDBY_USERNAME], CHANGEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [CHANGEDBY_APPLICATION], CHANGEDBY.USERNAME as [CHANGEDBY_USERNAME], USR_CHILDEXTENSION.DATEADDED, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.DATECHANGED, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.TSLONG, USR_CHILDEXTENSION.FUNDED, uct.[ID] as CHILDTRANSFERID, uct.[SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID] as CHILDTRANSFERCHILDID, uct.[FORMCOMPLETIONDATE], uct.[FORMCOMPLETEDBY], uct.[FORMENTEREDBY], uct.[FIELDDATEOFTRANSFER], uct.[EXPLANATION], uct.FROMREGISTRATIONDATE, dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDPROJECTLOOKUPID(uct.FROMPROJECTID) as FROMPROJECTNAME, uct.[CRMDATEOFTRANSFER], dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDPROJECTLOOKUPID(uct.TOPROJECTID) as TOPROJECTLOOKUPID, uct.DATEADDED as CHILDTRANSFERDATEADDED, soc.CONSTITUENTID from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION join dbo.SponsorshipOpportunityChild soc on dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc.ID join dbo.USR_CHILDTRANSFER uct on uct.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soc.ID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [ADDEDBY] on [ADDEDBY].ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.ADDEDBYID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [CHANGEDBY] on [CHANGEDBY].ID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.CHANGEDBYID

OutputField.Name: WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE
OutputField.Caption: When I play with friends we

OutputField.Name: WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY
OutputField.Caption: When at home I help out by

OutputField.Name: WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM
OutputField.Caption: When I talk to god I ask Him
